embed.description: A list of every command offered by this bot.

fields.name: Usable By Everyone
fields.value:
`help - Displays this.
ping - Pings the bot.
say <optional channel, message> - Makes the bot say whatever you command it to. Can specify channel to send.
check_stats <season> - Checks the stats for the season you give. Doesn't support the latest season.`

fields.name: Gatekeeper+ Commands
fields.value:
`gk verify <user> - Verifies the user mentioned.
gk kick <user, reason> - Kicks the user mentioned if they aren't verified. A reason is needed, too.
gk ban <user, reason> - Bans the user mentioned if they aren't verified. A reason is needed, too.`

fields.name: Mod+ Commands
fields.value:
`season_add <season, a message id> - Gives the S<season> role (which must exist beforehand) to everyone who joined before <a message id> was created.
role_id <role name> - Gets the ID of <role name)>.`
